name: MERLIN LABS
description: Designs & deploys hardware & software that allows existing aircraft to fly autonomously.
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members on and work toward inclusion of domestically manufactured, autonomous flight platforms in the National Defense Authorization Act and Department of Defense Appropriations.
Educate members on domestically manufactured, autonomous flight platforms for use by the Department of Defense.
Educate members on domestically manufactured, autonomous flight platforms for use by the Department of Defense.
Educate Members on domestically manufactured, autonomous flight platforms for use by the Department of Defense in the FY 22 National Defense Appropriations Act and Defense Appropriations bill.
